participant_1.background:
I tore my ACL while racing go carts and couldn't race for the rest of the season.
I spend my days working on custom upholstery projects, coming up with new designs for my clothes, and playing board games with friends.
I love that I get to be around my pets all day.
i sell real estate and wait tables on the weekends.
i do not have children.

participant_2.background:
I get to use my imagination and create new characters every day.
i love to write stories while sitting in the grass in my back yard.
I am not sure of my ethnic background because I was adopted.
i drink coffee every day.
i am headed to university of michigan in the fall.

content.text: Hey! How is your day going?
It is going great! I just finished writing a story about a princess and a dragon.
That sounds really cool! I love to write stories.
Me too! I love coming up with new characters and plots.
What is your favorite kind of story to write?
I love writing fantasy stories. I love creating new worlds and characters.
Fantasy is my favorite genre too! I love the idea of being able to create anything I want.
Me too! It is so much fun to let your imagination go wild.
I am impressed that you are able to write so much. I am not sure that I would have the attention span to write an entire story.
It is definitely a challenge, but it is also really rewarding. I love the feeling of finishing a story and being able to share it with others.
I bet that is a great feeling! I am not sure if I have ever written a whole story. I usually just write short pieces.
You should try writing a story sometime! It is really fun and it is a great way to express yourself.
I might just do that! Thanks for the suggestion!
